meanings.definition: The quality or state of being like paper.
meanings.sent1: The paperinesses of the leaves made them easy to crumple.
meanings.sent2: The artist used special paint to create a paperinesses effect on the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The paperinesses of the tissue made it feel delicate and light.
meanings.sent4: Her skin had a strange paperinesses, as if it could tear at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The paperinesses of the old book gave it a nostalgic charm.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a paper-like texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The paperinesses of the fabric made it ideal for origami.
meanings.sent2: The paperinesses of the invitation made it look elegant and sophisticated.
meanings.sent3: The paperinesses of the cake frosting made it look like edible paper.
meanings.sent4: The paperinesses of the clouds reminded her of cotton candy in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The paperinesses of the new wallpaper gave the room a fresh feel.
